CustomField.formula: IF(POE_WS_Email__c , BR() & "Windstream" & BR() & BR() & "PerfectSource (Traditional)" & BR() & BR() & "You will recieve an email to update the password and create your account.", '') & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(UID_Windstream__c)) , BR() & "Winsales (D2D)" & BR() & BR() & "Username Login:" & UID_Windstream__c & BR() & "Password:" & POE_WS_Pass__c & BR() & "Vendor ID (VID):" & POE_VendorId__c , '')
CustomField.label: Email Body Windstream
